Database

TCMSP: a database of systems pharmacology for drug discovery from herbal medicines

title: Tong Wu
text: Hi! My name is Tong Wu. I am a PhD researcher at Technische Universität München (TUM) and Helmholtz Zentrum München (HMGU). My research topic focuses on the role of bacteriophages and their effects on human health.
